title: Asian Glazed Chicken Thighs
ingredients: 1/3 cup soy sauce (such as Silver Swan®)
creator: Chef LePapu

title: Orange and Milk-Braised Pork Carnitas
ingredients: 3 1/2 pounds boneless pork shoulder, cut into large pieces
1 tablespoon kosher salt, or more to taste
creator: Chef John

title: Rigatoni alla Genovese
ingredients: 2 pounds red onions, sliced salt to taste
creator: Chef Luigi

title: Paneer Khurchan Masala
ingredients: For Ginger Garlic Paste : 8-9 Garlic cloves, लहसुन, 1 inch Ginger, peeled, slice, अदरक, Salt to taste, नमक स्वादअनुसार
For Onion Tomato Masala : 2 tbsp Ghee, घी, ½ tbsp Oil, तेल, ½ tsp Cumin seeds, जीरा

Prepared Ginger Garlic Paste : 1 medium Onion, slice, प्याज, 1 tsp Coriander powder, धनिया पाउडर, ¼ tsp Cumin powder, जीरा पाउडर, A pinch of asafoetida, हींग, 1 tbsp Degi red chili powder, देगी लाल मिर्च पाउडर, ½ tsp Turmeric powder, हल्दी पाउडर, 1 cup fresh Tomato puree, ताज़े टमाटर की प्यूरी, 2 medium Tomato, chopped, टमाटर, ¼ cup Water, पानी, Leftover marination, बचा हुआ मैरिनेशन

For Paneer Tikka Marination : 1 ½ tsp Degi red chili powder, देगी लाल मिर्च पाउडर, ¼ tsp Coriander powder, धनिया पाउडर, A pinch of asafoetida, हींग, 1 tsp Ginger Garlic Paste, अदरक लहसुन का पेस्ट, Salt to taste, नमक स्वादअनुसार, 1 tsp Oil, तेल, 1 ½ tbsp Curd, beaten, दही, 1 tsp Roasted Gram flour, भुने चने का बेसन, 500 gms Paneer, cut into slab, पनीर
For Searing Paneer and Tossing : 1 tbsp Ghee, घी, Marinated Paneer, मैरिनेटेड पनीर, 1 large Capsicum, sliced, शिमला मिर्च, 1 medium Onion, sliced, प्याज

For Paneer Khurchan : Toasted Onion, capsicum, टॉस प्याज और शिमला मिर्च, Seared Paneer, sliced, तला हुआ पनीर, Prepared Onion Tomato Masala, तयार किया हुआ प्याज टमाटर मसाला, ½ medium Tomato, sliced, टमाटर, Salt to taste, नमक स्वादअनुसार, ½ tsp Dry fenugreek leaves, crushed, कसूरी मेथी, 1 Green chili, less spicy, slice, हरी मिर्च, 1 tbsp Coriander leaves, chopped, धनिया पत्ता
For Garnish : Coriander sprig, धनिया पत्ता
creator: Master Chef Tirth
